snippet: The spending plan released by Gov. Jerry Brown disappointed Democratic lawmakers who had hoped that rising revenues would finance social programs.
abstract: California's Gov Jerry Brown proposes smaller budget than projected and repeatedly cautions against new spending, disappointing Democratic lawmakers who had hoped that rising state tax revenues would finance social programs after years of austerity.
lead_paragraph: The spending plan released by Gov. Jerry Brown disappointed Democratic lawmakers who had hoped that rising revenues would finance social programs.

headline.main: California Governor Issues Cautious Budget, Disappointing Democrats
headline.print_headline: California Governor Issues Cautious Budget, Disappointing Democrats
